 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָכַס‎</span>] **verb** ==bind== (Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***rakâsu***</u></abbr>, id.; Late Hebrew ***found, lay foundation*** (rare); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***bind with*** <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [rope tying camel's head to forefoot] ([[BDB#Frey|Frey]]); but usually ***turn over, reverse*** ([[BDB#Lane|Lane]])); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְכְּסוּ‎</span> ([[BDB#P|P]]) [[Exod.28.28|Exod 28:28]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּרְכְּסוּ‎</span> [[Exod.39.21|Exod 39:21]], ***bind*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חשֶׁן‎</span> by (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span>) its rings to (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span>) rings of ephod.
